participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and family-oriented, with a sweet tooth and practical approach to life.
participant_1.background: I take care of my mother and father. I really like cake and don t prefer vegetables. I m almost finished with my degree. I have one sister and a niece and nephew. I m 49, male and live in Dublin, Ireland.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and eager, with a playful spirit and a determination to achieve her dreams.
participant_2.background: I am saving money to buy my first car. I currently work at McDonald's. I am eighteen years old. I live with my parents. I am taking a year off before I start college.
